title: OMNI Combined, Definitive, Hourly IMF and Plasma Data, and Energetic Proton Fluxes, Time-Shifted to the Nose of the Earth's Bow Shock, plus Solar and Magnetic Indices - J.H. King, N. Papitashvili (ADNET, NASA GSFC)

info.contact: J.H. King, N. Papitashvili @ ADNET, NASA GSFC

parameters.name: Rot1800
parameters.description: Bartels Rotation Number (half-hour midpoint). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Rot#']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: IMF1800
parameters.description: OMNI ID code for the source spacecraft for time-shifted IMF values (see OMNI documentation link for codes) (half-hour midpoint). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['IMF']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: PLS1800
